segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink, and it's making such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, but she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, and she's just drying that plate like it's normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm she is while the kitchen is flooding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy and girl are being so sneaky, trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall off that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so happy, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and peaceful, unlike the chaos in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to turn off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just strange and a bit frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR
